segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting so patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s been promised something wonderful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to fall, and she’s just going to stand there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s not even being careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will scream if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so tense, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to regret climbing up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like she’s waiting for a miracle.
segments.speaker: PAR
